findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is declared as external and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in transferFrom function.

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as external and has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: Potential burn vulnerability in internal _burn function.

findings.title: Swap Functions
findings.description: Multiple swap functions are present in the contract, which could lead to potential security vulnerabilities if not implemented correctly.

findings.title: Sync Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The sync function has a vulnerability marked with 🛑 symbol.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor of the DividendPayingToken contract does not initialize its state variables.
